text: We'll hear argument now in number oh oh six five six seven, Larry Dean Dusenbery versus the United States.
Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court.
Well, you take the position that it's not sufficient that there be staff at the prison who deliver mail to the inmates?
That, in and of itself, is not sufficient.
whereby a prison employee delivers certified mail to prisoners is inadequate in your...
That that, in and of itself, is inadequate.
Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court.
[NS] First of all, I'd like to address the the suggestion that these cases are about false claims.
